sentences.en: But everyone knows Serena, and everyone is talking.
sentences.cn: 但人人都认识Serena, 而且每个人都在谈论.

sentences.en: Her next two films are slated to be Cleopatra and Serena, the story of a frontier woman who, among many other things, tries to kill her stepson.
sentences.cn: 朱莉接下来的计划包括《新埃及艳后》和《塞丽娜》两部电影，后一部讲述的是一个女人试图杀死继子的故事。

sentences.en: I don't think I've ever met anyone's parents, except Serena's.
sentences.cn: 我想我不会见任何人的父母除了塞丽娜的.

sentences.en: I fell in love with Serena long before I met her.
sentences.cn: 我在遇到塞丽娜之前就爱上了她.

sentences.en: I find it very hard to believe that Serena broke up with Rick.
sentences.cn: 我很难相信‘她和瑞克分手了’.

sentences.en: I just feel bad for Serena.
I'm not gonna see Serena again or even talk to her.
sentences.cn: 我不会再去见Serena或和她说话.

sentences.en: Okay, so to recap, which Serena loves for me to do.
sentences.cn: 好的, 来回顾下, SERENA喜欢我这么干.

sentences.en: Rufus Humphrey , Serena , I'd like you to meet Rufus Humphrey.
Serena : And if you get a drink, they're also serving pigs.
sentences.cn: 你要是也喝酒, 他们连猪都招待.

sentences.en: Serena : It's okay. You're still a man in my eyes.
sentences.cn: 没事的, 在我眼里你依然是个男人.

sentences.en: Serena : So what? Start over. It can be done.
sentences.cn: 那又 怎么样 ?重新开始, 一切都会好的.

sentences.en: Serena : You just love when a girl talks to you.
sentences.cn: 只有跟你说下流话的时候,你才喜欢.

sentences.en: Serena is defeated Venus to win the championship at Wimbledon.
sentences.cn: 塞丽娜在温布尔登女子职业网球赛上击败维纳斯,夺得冠军.

sentences.en: Serena: Well , you can't be worse than the guys I do know.
sentences.cn: 至少, 你比我认识的那些男生强.

sentences.en: Venus has more titles, but Serena is hot on her heels.
sentences.cn: 维纳斯虽然拥有更多冠军头衔, 但瑟琳娜正紧追在后.

phrases.tran_cn: 塞雷娜·威廉姆斯（网坛名将，小威廉姆斯）

trans.tran_cn: 塞丽娜(f.) 爱情小夜曲
